# Status Badges for README

Add these badges to the top of your main README.md file:

## Recommended Badges

```markdown
[![TypeScript Tests](https://github.com/hexydec/dabby/actions/workflows/test.yml/badge.svg?branch=exp-ts)](https://github.com/hexydec/dabby/actions/workflows/test.yml)
[![CI/CD Pipeline](https://github.com/hexydec/dabby/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/hexydec/dabby/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
[![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/dabbyjs.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/dabbyjs)
[![Bundle Size](https://img.shields.io/bundlephobia/minzip/dabbyjs)](https://bundlephobia.com/package/dabbyjs)
[![TypeScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/TypeScript-5.9-blue.svg)](https://www.typescriptlang.org/)
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
```

## Preview

When rendered, the badges will look like this:

[![TypeScript Tests](https://github.com/hexydec/dabby/actions/workflows/test.yml/badge.svg?branch=exp-ts)](https://github.com/hexydec/dabby/actions/workflows/test.yml)
[![CI/CD Pipeline](https://github.com/hexydec/dabby/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/hexydec/dabby/actions/workflows/ci.yml)
[![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/dabbyjs.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/dabbyjs)
[![Bundle Size](https://img.shields.io/bundlephobia/minzip/dabbyjs)](https://bundlephobia.com/package/dabbyjs)
[![TypeScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/TypeScript-5.9-blue.svg)](https://www.typescriptlang.org/)
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)

## Individual Badges

### GitHub Actions Status
```markdown
[![TypeScript Tests](https://github.com/hexydec/dabby/actions/workflows/test.yml/badge.svg?branch=exp-ts)](https://github.com/hexydec/dabby/actions/workflows/test.yml)
```

### NPM Version
```markdown
[![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/dabbyjs.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/dabbyjs)
```

### Bundle Size
```markdown
[![Bundle Size](https://img.shields.io/bundlephobia/minzip/dabbyjs)](https://bundlephobia.com/package/dabbyjs)
```

### TypeScript Version
```markdown
[![TypeScript](https://img.shields.io/badge/TypeScript-5.9-blue.svg)](https://www.typescriptlang.org/)
```

```markdown
[![License: MIT](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-yellow.svg)](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT)
```

### Downloads
```markdown
[![npm downloads](https://img.shields.io/npm/dm/dabbyjs.svg)](https://www.npmjs.com/package/dabbyjs)
```

## Custom Styling

For a specific branch:
```markdown
[![Tests](https://github.com/hexydec/dabby/actions/workflows/test.yml/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://github.com/hexydec/dabby/actions/workflows/test.yml)
```

For a specific event:
```markdown
[![Tests](https://github.com/hexydec/dabby/actions/workflows/test.yml/badge.svg?event=push)](https://github.com/hexydec/dabby/actions/workflows/test.yml)
```
